title: Energy Intensity - Extract
publisher: Department for Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy
datasetNotes: No landing page for this dataset as it is a bespoke dataset supplied by BEIS (Warren Evans) directly to IDS-D as part of the Climate Change Platform project. It is an extract of BEIS published data of the same name, landing page: https://www.gov.uk/government/statistics/total-energy-section-1-energy-trends
notes: Priority dataset for Climate Change Platform project.
